channel.title: Starting skills?
channel.description: how do i make it so all players start with a skill at a certain level? i want every1 to have 20 theive when they log in.

item.title: Starting skills?
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

hmmm, go on client.java and find where it starts adding stuff for a player that just made an account and add

addSkillXP(EXP, 17);

In the EXP, just add what ever the exp you need for level 20.
And to find where to add this, what I do, I search for: setSidebarInterface…
And add that right under there since thats where it starts setting things for when you log in.
…only problem is, this will probaly then add that exp every time they log in…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2009, 02:36:05 am[/size][hr]Okay actualy I might of found it, search for this:

	for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) {
		if (i == playerHitpoints) {
			playerLevel[i] = 10; //LEVEL
			playerXP[i] = 1500; //EXP
		} else {
			playerLevel[i] = 1;
			playerXP[i] = 0;
		}
	}

And where it says hitpoints just change it to theiving…

If it doesn’t work then try looking in the Player.java or the PlayerHandler

Read full topic
